susceptible_to: Susceptible to prunus necrotic ring-spot virus, powdery mildew and aphids
storability: Retains 75%-80% alpha acid after 6 months storage at 20ºC (68ºF)
style_guide: Imperial Stout, Stout, India Pale Ale, Barley Wine
substitutes: Nugget, Columbus, Zeus, Chinook, Pride of Ringwood, Eroica, Newport, Cluster, Brewers Gold
resistant_to: Resistant to downy mildew and peronospera
name: Galena
